Headline: Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running with significant delays near 95th/Dan Ryan due to signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with significant delays near 95th/Dan Ryan due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

  • #24 Wentworth
  • #29 State
  • #34 South Michigan
  • #95 95th
  • #103 West 103rd
  • #106 East 103rd

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
